alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dale and southeastern Coffee Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Brockton to near Newton. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Waterford, Knox Field, Gerald, Lowe Army Heliport, Kelly, Cairns Aaf, Keyton, Hanchey Field, Coppinville and Enterprise Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
